name: fsolauncher
description: Install, play, and configure FreeSO easily

scripts.buildwin: electron-packager . fsolauncher --app-copyright="Copyright (C) FreeSO. All rights reserved." --icon=./beta.ico --asar.unpackDir="{export,fsolauncher_ui/images,fsolauncher_ui/sounds,fsolauncher_ui/fonts}" --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --overwrite --win32metadata.CompanyName="FreeSO.org" --win32metadata.requested-execution-level="requireAdministrator" --version-string.FileDescription="FreeSO Launcher" --out ../release && npm run copywin && npm run compileiss
scripts.builddarwin: electron-packager . FreeSO\ Launcher --icon=./beta.icns  --app-copyright="Copyright (C) FreeSO. All rights reserved." --asar.unpackDir="{export,fsolauncher_ui/images,fsolauncher_ui/sounds,fsolauncher_ui/fonts}" --platform=darwin --arch=universal --overwrite --version-string.FileDescription="FreeSO Launcher" --out ../release && electron-installer-dmg ../release/FreeSO\ Launcher-darwin-universal/FreeSO\ Launcher.app FreeSO\ Launcher --out=../release --icon=./beta.icns --background=./osx_dmg.png --title=FreeSO\ Launcher --overwrite

author: ItsSim
